unnormalised: **Exam Prep Apps: The Real MVP This Exam Season?**
normalised: **Exam Prep Apps: The Real M V P This Exam Season?**

unnormalised: Hey folks! With exams looming, are you drowning in textbooks and Chai? Well, hold that cup, because exam prep apps are becoming the go-to saviors for students across India.
normalised: Hey folks! With exams looming, are you drowning in textbooks and Chai? Well, hold that cup, because exam prep apps are becoming the go-to saviors for students across India.

unnormalised: From JEE aspirants in Kota to UPSC dreamers in Delhi, these apps are offering personalized learning, mock tests galore, and instant doubt clearing. Think interactive quizzes instead of boring notes – much more fun, right?
normalised: From J E E aspirants in Kota to U P S C dreamers in Delhi, these apps are offering personalized learning, mock tests galore, and instant doubt clearing. Think interactive quizzes instead of boring notes – much more fun, right?

unnormalised: Apps like Testbook and Embibe are reporting a huge spike in downloads, especially around festival times (Onam studies + Biryani breaks!). They offer everything from NCERT solutions to cracking tips from toppers, all at your fingertips.
normalised: Apps like Testbook and Embibe are reporting a huge spike in downloads, especially around festival times (Onam studies plus Biryani breaks!). They offer everything from N C E R T solutions to cracking tips from toppers, all at your fingertips.

unnormalised: Even coaching centers like Allen are jumping on the bandwagon with their own digital platforms. The convenience factor is undeniable. Study on the bus to college, during your lunch break – whenever, wherever!
normalised: Even coaching centers like Allen are jumping on the bandwagon with their own digital platforms. The convenience factor is undeniable. Study on the bus to college, during your lunch break – whenever, wherever!

unnormalised: Plus, many apps offer vernacular content, making education accessible to more students from every corner of the country. Seems like these apps are truly changing the game, one correct answer at a time! Forget rote learning; it’s all about smart learning now. All the best for your exams!
normalised: Plus, many apps offer vernacular content, making education accessible to more students from every corner of the country. Seems like these apps are truly changing the game, one correct answer at a time! Forget rote learning; it’s all about smart learning now. All the best for your exams!
